page.title: 07THE HAXEY HOOD GAME
page.content: The earliest date that they have got proof of that the Haxey Hood has been going on,is 1828,which is a report that was in the Retford Times. The Hoods that are thrown up are called Sack Hoods.There are 12,and you get 50p by taking one to the local pub.There is another Hood,called the Sway Hood.That is thrown up,and a scrum is formed to push it to 2 different pubs. The songs that are sung are:_'John Barleycorn','Farmers Boy',and 'Canons.' The clothes that the Lord of the Boggins wear are a hat,with artificial flowers on,and a red hunting coat.
